author: A_Brickset_user
title: Pretty Basic, But worth the money.
review: BUY IT WHILE YOU STILL CAN! (some are avalible from LEGO.com., Still.) There is no steering wheel! Why? It still gets a 9, because anything Studio is great. I am glad I got it nonetheless, because now I have A TON of studios sets from LEGO.

author: Atbin7856
title: Nice build!
review:
I got this from Lego shop at home when I was roughly 7 or 8 years old from my father, so here's my review:

Pros:
Comic on the back of the instructions.
Camera.
Fig is great.

Cons: 
None.

Overall a great set to make a Lego film scenario!
